text:
@chrislhayes Panicked by the plummeting stock market in response to the spreading coronavirus,
Trump arranged for some spin via televised political entertainment.

Good thing America doesn't have a grifter con artist faking it with a host of enabling clowns.

Don't forget to think & pray... https://t.co/32Ebqh9kYN

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
